Text: Thanks man, gonna give this show a try :)

Yes thanks. I watched this last night, it's not going to rival something like Ghost Hunters or Ghost Adventures, it's a small budget affair and the team in it are a bit weak personality wise. But it's not as bad as I thought it would be. Will continue to watch it.
good thing for the collector that it was an old expensive typewriter probably worth alot today that was haunted. I mean for the sake of his haunted museum ^^.. What a shyster :D
